name: Verify PostgreSQL client connection in Shell app via UI
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- PostgreSQL app installed.
- Shell app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Get Postgres Users.Postgres User Credentials[0].Uri from `output` API.
- Open Shell app.
- Run `psql {URI}` command in Shell app.

### Verify that:

- psql connection is successful.
descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • PostgreSQL app installed.
  • Shell app installed.

Steps:

  • Login with valid credentials.
  • Get Postgres Users.Postgres User Credentials[0].Uri from output API.
  • Open Shell app.
  • Run psql {URI} command in Shell app.

Verify that:

  • psql connection is successful.
